function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Amplification of social, spatial, and economic inequalities due to COVID-19","Impact":"Worsening of existing inequalities, leading to a more harmful impact of the virus","Mitigation":"Addressing social and economic inequalities, providing support to vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, data analytics for identifying vulnerable areas","People":"Vulnerable and marginalized populations","Owner":"Government, community organizations"},{"Description":"Spread of the infection in extensively urbanized areas","Impact":"Higher risk of infection due to population density","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce population density, improving healthcare infrastructure in urban areas","Technologies":"Urban planning software, healthcare technology for rapid testing and treatment","People":"Urban residents, healthcare workers","Owner":"City authorities, healthcare institutions"}]}
